onboarding_welcome_description:
We have questions and you have answers.
Let's get started!
onboarding_welcome_accept_description: I accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
onboarding_welcome_opt_in: I want to receive your newsletter, offers, and promotions.
auth_login_notice: If you don't have an account, we'll create one automatically with your email.
auth_logout_redirecting_in: You will be redirected to the login page in {timer} seconds
otp_auth_copy_instructions: Tip: You can copy and paste the code from your email!
